comments.text:
User-Agent:       Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; rv:2.0b9) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b9
Build Identifier: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.0; rv:2.0b9) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/4.0b9

Printing / print previewing an XML document results in a blank page (just containing page headers and footers.)

Reproducible: Always

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open XML file in Firefox. 
--> Document tree is displayed, and the message "... does not appear to have any style information associated with it ..."

2. Print the document
Actual Results:  
A single empty page is printed.

Expected Results:  
A set of pages containing the XML document tree.
comments.creator: kuno.meyer@gmx.ch
